# Unveiling Financial Insights: Retrieving SEC Data

## Dive into the World of SEC Filings

Welcome to the first chapter of our journey into SEC data analysis! In this section, we embark on the exciting process of retrieving financial data from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) filings using the power of R.
